docs.text: the story brings us to the twilight of the gulf war , with the allied troops victorious .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: majpr archie gates ( clooney ) leads an enterprising bunch of grunts to a rather unorthodox post-war looting spree ; the millions in gold bars secretly stowed away by saddam in a desolate village in the desert .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: as the rest of the troops are celebrating their victory and getting ready to be shipped home , this `wild bunch goes awol on an armed hum-vee ( the vehicle of choice of the us army ) .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: they soon find out that they have much resistance , as they get tangled with the local rebellion against saddams forces .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: frequently switching their modes between looters and robin hoods merry men , they become consciously attacked by their own morals .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: as the film begins to roll , it seemed to have a rather `light mood to it .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: `special effects such as when gates describes to his men how a bullet can kill simply paves the way for a light-hearted funny action movie .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: three kings is much smarter than that .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: as the conflict becomes more and more complex , the audience will be trapped in a limbo , trying to stay focussed on that light-mood/serious-mood that the film seem to portray .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: i personally found this analogous to the same feelings of the main characters involved in the film ; trapped between their initial plan paved by greed and their own sense of humanity .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: this simply made the entire experience of watching three kings truly brilliant .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: action sequences are not shot as your old-fashioned war films nor anything like steven spielbergs in-your-face war violence .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: they are carefully built to generate tension with just the right tight close-ups and pauses , right before the action starts .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: not john woo for sure but more of sergio leones spaghetti western style ( tons of them starring clint eastwood ) .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: great performances by clooney and wahlberg but the brilliance have to lie in the conception of this film ; the screenwriter and the director .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: three kings ranks among the best films of the year , well , for me at least .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: highly recommended .
